setRelativity(int) - Method in class nl.uu.cs.ias.pursuerevader.game.GameCommunicator
There are three different way in which the game can be visualized using the Applet:
- GridProperties.ABSOLUTE: Use absolute axes, the agents will both move and turn
- GridProperties.POSITION_RELATIVE: Set (0,0) on the position of the pursuer
- GridProperties.RELATIVE: Position relative, and also rotate axes so that the angle of the pursuer is always 0.

The first choice is the most clear one, because it will show the movement and direction of both agents.
setTurnHeading(double) - Method in class nl.uu.cs.ias.pursuerevader.game.Receiver
 
startSimulation(int, boolean) - Method in class nl.uu.cs.ias.pursuerevader.game.GameCommunicator
A game is started using this method

When implementing the SOM, it will be necessary to train it by playing this game very often.
startSimulation(int, boolean) - Method in class nl.uu.cs.ias.pursuerevader.ui.BaseGUI
